p: Secreted hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) and hepatitis B e-antigen (HBeAg) were detected in medium collected from HBV-infected cells using a HBsAg/HBeAg ELISA kit (Shanghai Kehua Bio-engineering Co., Ltd), according to the manufacturer's instructions. The results were assessed using a Multiskan MK3 microplate spectrophotometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.). The optical density (OD) values are presented as the mean Â± standard deviation of OD 450-OD 630. The cut-off value was calculated according to the manufacturer's instructions.
